debates.showAs: Commission on the Future of the Family Farm Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a body to be known, in the Irish language, as An Coimisiún um Thodhchaí na Feirme Teaghlaigh or, in the English language, as the Commission on the Future of the Family Farm; to define its functions; and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú comhlacht ar a dtabharfar, sa Ghaeilge, An Coimisiún um Thodhchaí na Feirme Teaghlaigh nó, sa Bhéarla, the Commission on the Future of the Family Farm; do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Commission on the Future of the Family Farm Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán gCoimisiún um Thodhchaí na Feirme Teaghlaigh, 2024

debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Employment Equality (Abolition of Mandatory Retirement Age) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Aois Scoir Shainordaitheach a Chealú), 2022

debates.showAs: Social Welfare (Payment Order) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Social Welfare (Payment Order) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Social Welfare (Payment Order) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the extension of the powers of the Liable Relatives Unit of the Department of Social Protection, to make a Determination Order in respect of Jobseekers Transitional Payment to one parent families, to include any necessary application to the District Court for a Payment Order, thus enabling the State to recoup, from a “liable relative”, a contribution towards the cost of providing said payment and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cumhachtaí an Aonaid um Ghaolta faoi Dhliteanas de chuid na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí a leathnú chuig Ordú Cinnidh a dhéanamh, i leith Íocaíocht Eatramhach Cuardaitheora Poist le teaghlaigh aontuisimitheora, chun aon iarratas chun na Cúirte Dúiche ar Ordú Íocaíochta is gá a áireamh, ionas gur féidir leis an Stát ranníoc a fháil ar ais ó “ghaol faoi dhliteanas” faoi chomhair an chostais a bhaineann leis an íocaíocht sin a sholáthar agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999, to include explicit provision for the Minister to provide policy direction to the Commission for Regulation of Utilities, to introduce a moratorium on disconnections of gas and electricity supply to domestic customers for non-payment during the annual fuel allowance season or during other periods of time the Minister may deem appropriate.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun socrú follasach a áireamh ann maidir leis an Aire do sholáthar treorú beartais don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais, do thabhairt isteach moratóir ar dhíchónascthaí soláthair gáis agus leictreachais do chustaiméirí baile mar gheall ar neamhíoc le linn an tséasúir bhliantúil liúntais breosla nó le linn tréimhsí ama eile a mheasfaidh an tAire is cuí.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Prohibition of Winter Disconnections) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialáil Leictreachais (Leasú) (Díchónascthaí sa Gheimhreadh a Thoirmeasc), 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that regard be had by public bodies to the desirability of reducing socio-economic and other inequalities suffered by those in rural Ireland, to provide for the carrying out of rural impact assessments in respect of measures that are likely to have a significant socio-economic impact or effect on rural Ireland and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh aird ag comhlachtaí poiblí ar a inmhianaithe atá sé neamhionannais shocheacnamaíocha agus eile arna bhfulaingt ag daoine faoin tuath in Éirinn a laghdú, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le measúnachtaí tionchair tuaithe a dhéanamh i leith bearta ar dóigh tionchar socheacnamaíoch suntasach a bheith acu nó éifeacht shocheacnamaíoch shuntasach a bheith leo ar an tuath in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Social Welfare Commission Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a commission to make recommendations and report annually on the adequacy of social welfare rates in the State; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le coimisiún a bhunú chun moltaí a dhéanamh agus chun tuarascáil a thabhairt gach bliain maidir le leordhóthanacht rátaí leasa shóisialaigh sa Stát; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Choimisiún Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2020

debates.showAs: River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create a single competent authority to co-ordinate flood risk and management along the River Shannon and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú údarás inniúil aonair chun priacal agus bainistiú tuile a chomhordú feadh Abhainn na Sionainne agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhaireacht Bainistíochta Abhainn na Sionainne, 2020
